spec_data.Name: perl-Daemon-Generic
spec_data.Description:
Daemon::Generic provides a framework for starting, stopping, reconfiguring
daemon-like programs. The framework provides for standard commands that
work for as init.d files and as apachectl-like commands.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:14:18 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Framework to provide start/stop/reload for a daemon
